attributes.action: Investigate people who are sacked because of voting out in the referendum vote
attributes.background: I have seen a video in which Terry Christian has admitted he knows employers who have sacked people because of voting out in the  2016 EU referendum.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something that the UK Government or Parliament isn't responsible for. 

If someone feels they have been unfairly sacked they can apply to an employment tribunal who will investigate their case.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/dismissal
